name: Tank Shoot IS war 2017
description: Tank Shoot IS war 2017 is an army tanks war game. Game has the upgraded, latest and most dangerous war machines that any army has. Tanks War game is the best blitz wargame on play store. Your country has been attacked by your enemy. They are using their latest war machine tanks. Your military lack in Tanks but defending your country is the only mission of your life. Your mission is to shoot and destroy entire enemy tanks which are trying to capture your areas.
